entities.description: Substance use disorder based on DSM-5 criteria using combinations of 'ANY' SUD variables.
Variables indicating overall SUD (i.e., disorder, no disorder) based on DSM-5 criteria.
Variables that incorporate prescription drug use disorder from respondents with any use of prescription drugs.
Drug use disorder including prescription drug use disorder due to any use of prescription drugs.
Drug use disorder including prescription drug use disorder due to any use of drugs other than marijuana.
Drug use disorder including prescription drug use disorder due to any use of prescription drugs, or alcohol use disorder.
Prescription psychotherapeutic use disorder including prescription psychotherapeutic use disorder due to any use of prescription drugs.
Prescription tranquilizer or sedative use disorder including prescription tranquilizer or sedative use disorder due to any use of tranquilizers or sedatives.

Prescription opioid use disorder including prescription pain reliever use disorder due to any use of pain relievers; the opioid use disorder estimates do not capture symptoms that arose solely from the use of illegally made fentanyl.

relationships.description: Indicates that SUD is based on combinations of 'ANY' SUD variables.
Incorporates prescription drug use disorder from respondents with any use of prescription drugs.
Includes the variable UD5ILLANY for drug use disorder due to any use of prescription drugs.
Includes the variable UD5IEMANY for drug use disorder due to any use of drugs other than marijuana.
Includes the variable UD5ILLALANY for drug use disorder including prescription drug use disorder or alcohol use disorder.
Includes the variable UD5PSYANY for prescription psychotherapeutic use disorder.
Includes the variable UD5TRQSDANY for prescription tranquilizer or sedative use disorder.
Includes the variable UD5OPIANY for prescription opioid use disorder.
